page.title: 07POPULATION - IDEN GREEN
page.content: {DENSITY:}This is a sparcely populated area, approximately 24 people per square mile. Density greatest around hamlet of Iden Green. Standen Street, Dingleden,2 small Council Estates - Medway(8 houses),Oakfield(12 houses). Other people live along isolated lanes in farmhouses,cottages,converted barns and oasts,individually built single houses. {AGE:} From survey of approximately half houses in area estimated age of population: Children (under 18) 132 Adults 160 Retired 88 {LENGTH OF RESIDENCE IN AREA:} Less than 1 year 12 Between 2-10 years 56 Between 10-50 years 62 Over 50 years 14
